item.title: Dockerizing a Hugo Static Website
item.description: Recently, I decided to containerize my personal website (the one you are on right now) using Docker. Prior to this, I was using Virtual Machines (VM's) as a development environment for my site. Compared to Docker containers, VM's were a huge drag on my computer's performance. They were bloated and heavy; each VM took up space on my hard disk measured in GB. By comparison, my post-build Docker image takes less than 150MB of disk space.
